Reviews.Title: Stay away....
Reviews.Author: Richard Canavan
Reviews.Content: I had 3 of these and each one failed after 1 month. They stopped recognizing the mouse, then video out started rolling and finally stopped seeing any hard drive I put in. NO SUPPORT, basically a flawed design..

Reviews.Title: Decent hardware, lousy software
Reviews.Author: Glenn M. Muller
Reviews.Content: Hardware worked well out of the box and was up and running in minutes. Using the DVR over my ethernet connection was challenging due to issues with the ActiveX controls needed to run the viewer in Internet Explorer. No support for Firefox or Chrome. The Software CD was blank, the manual is very poor and not written in proper English. After days of tinkering, I was absolutely unable to record on motion detection only. I called the US customer service numbers and they were both disconnected. The H264 video files are impossible to play on my PC no matter what player or codecs I download. It's a decent piece of hardware for the money, but the software will leave you frustrated.Since the original review, I did contact someone who spoke English and I have the software working properly. The system is a good value for the money. I would consider purchasing again.
